about_the_game:
A girl and a ghost, "Bakechan," are trapped in an apartment building.

While Bakechan's ability unlocks the exit,
Find and fight off the strange creatures while Bakechan's ability unlocks the exits.

1.Move Bakechan with the right stick or mouse.
2.Left stick or WASD to move the girl
3.When you find a mistake, move "Bakechan" to the location.
4.A button or Space long press to repel!
5.The game is over when there are 3 or more anomalies.

Aim for the top floor with Bake-chan.

SYON" is a side-scrolling horror and puzzle game.
The difficulty level increases as you progress, but it is basically EASY.

Play time

.30 to 60 min.
(More than 60 minutes including preparation & ending)

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
